rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0001
rows.name: You know, my teacher is worried about something.

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0002
rows.name:
He says he's having trouble getting
along with his Blade.

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0003
rows.name:
He said once you've hit a wall, it's hard to deepen
your bond, even if you work and fight together.

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0004
rows.name:
But I don't think that's true.
I think if you fight, and fight, and fight it out,
you'll see a whole new world.

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0005
rows.name:
An ordinary Driver might not be able
to reach that point, but...

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0006
rows.name:
If your compatibility could deepen into such a
wonderful relationship... that would be the best!
